CheckBoxHandler() - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossView.CheckBoxHandler
 
checkMessage(String) - Method in class piccross.PiccrossView
This method will check the message entered by user and tries to match which one of the case below.
connect - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
PiccrossNetworkModalVC object which will be used as backend of dialog box for connecting to server.
Connect() - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossView.openConnection.Connect
 
connected - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
Represents a boolean value that shows if we are connected to a server or not.
consoleInput - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
Represents the input area where user can enter commands or chat with other players when connected to server.
consoleInputPanel - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
Represents the area where user can see the output from the game and server.
consoleOutputTextArea - Static variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
consoleOutputTextArea will display outputs to the player.
consolePanel - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
consolePanel will hold point panel, timer panel and scroll pane inside it self.
ControllableTimer - Class in piccross
ControllableTimer: A timer that can be started and stopped.
ControllableTimer(PiccrossView) - Constructor for class piccross.ControllableTimer
Constructor requires reference to a PiccrossView class.
Controller() - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC.Controller
 
count - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
Represents number of buttons received from a game send by server.
